title: No. 16 Texas Tech hits walkoff grand slam in 16-12 win over No. 2 Texas in 10 innings - Burnt Orange Nation
content:
1. No. 16 Texas Tech hits walkoff grand slam in 16-12 win over No. 2 Texas in 10 innings  Burnt Orange Nation
  2. Watch: Texas Tech’s Kurt Wilson Delivers Second Day of Walk-Off Heroics in Win Over Texas  Sports Illustrated
  3. Texas Tech baseball falls to Texas in Big 12 series finale, drops first home contest  LubbockOnline.com
  4. Two days, two walk-offs for Texas Tech’s Kurt Wilson  MLB.com
  5. Tech drops Sunday finale against Texas - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: On Friday, Kurt Wilson stole home to win in the 10th inning. On Saturday, he hit a walkoff grand slam.
